subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: James L. Dolan, the Madison Square Garden chairman, has been unwilling to do what he continually asks of Knicks fans: keep the faith and invest in the potential for success.
snippet: James L. Dolan, the Madison Square Garden chairman, has been unwilling to do what he continually asks of Knicks fans: keep the faith and invest in the potential for success.
